option.background_color.tooltip: Determines the background color of the loading screen
option.logo_opacity.tooltip: Determines the opacity of the Mojang icon from 0 to 1
option.bar_opacity.tooltip: Determines the opacity of the loading bar from 0 to 1
option.mods_only_once.tooltip: If true, every mod only falls down the screen once
option.hide_libraries.tooltip:
Hides mods marked as with the "Library" badge.
Note: not all library mods mark themselves as such, use the blacklist to hide ones that dont.
option.mod_id_blacklist.tooltip:
Use bash-like pattern matching to hide certain mods by id.
Default configuration excludes the ten million submods of Fabric Api.
option.screen_type.tooltip:
Defines the behavior of falling icons.

SNOWFLAKES: Icons fall down the screen like snowflakes (default)
STACKING: Icons stack neatly into a grid, filling up the screen

option.cycle_seconds.tooltip:
Time it takes for the screen to fill up in seconds.
For best results, set this to the average time it takes for your game to load.
